author: pintomeitar
body:
I think that if Resolve-DnsName would have the mDNS option it can be very useful just like the -UseLlmnrOnly. It's seems that dnsapi.dll(which is used by Resolve-DnsName) already implements mDNS . 
mDNS is very common on local network and can help researchers in a lot of situations.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @pintomeitar The cmdlet is not in the repo. It is in DnsClient module which is a Windows component. You should use other channels for your request (UserVoice site, MSFT forums and so on).

title: add to Reslove-DnsName cmdlet -mDNS option
